attributes.action: slow population growth in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Almost all the problems the world is facing at the moment stem (at least indirectly) from too many people. Global warming, international conflict, destruction of habitats and green space, pollution, lack of healthcare, poverty, poor education, lack of housing.. etc! We encourage the prime minister to cut all tax incentives to having children, and to raise public awareness over this issue.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "slow population growth in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11098.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stoppop/
